# metabase_user (Resource)



## Example Usage

```terraform
resource "metabase_user" "example" {
  email      = "john.doe@example.com"
  first_name = "John"
  last_name  = "Doe"
}
```

- **email** (String)
- **first_name** (String)
- **last_name** (String)
